title: Let’s Have Some Fun Today
description:
Jeff Passan joins Buster on Baggage Claim Monday to discuss Albert Pujols hitting his 700th career home run in Los Angeles, sharing a story about Alex Rodriguez seeking Pujols for advice, and the chase continues for Aaron Judge’s 61st home run. Then, they discuss if Aaron Judge is having the greatest season of all time, Judge’s future contract, and Don Mattingly’s tenure as Marlins manager comes to an end. Plus, everyone knows about Judge’s homers, but his teammates weigh in with Buster about his other skills that separate him as a player. Later, Sarah Langs joins to discuss Pujols’ season, Dodgers winning their 106th game, and if the Guardians can win the world series. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
